alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 6:35AM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lull in snow is expected early this morning, but lake effect snow showers are likely late this morning through this afternoon. Any snow that develops later today will likely cover untreated surfaces and reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
